name: Compressor
description:
Compressor is a simple puzzle game where the goal is to place as many tetris-like pieces into a given area before the walls close in.

Controls
    Mouse - Pick up and place with left click
    Q / E - Rotate the piece you are currently holding
    WASD - slide the piece you are holding in any direction for easier precision

I hope you enjoy this small game I made for Ludum Dare 42! It's my first game jam, so any feedback is greatly appreciated!
